morphInfos.tenseExplained: it was happening in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the ones being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was happening - by persons being spoken or written to
